!Sentinel Kendell: Recently the *orcs* of Fog Mountain have become bold, and have attacked our beautiful woods in large groups. Orcs have invaded our forests before, but never in such large numbers. We Elven fighters plan to take this opportunity to strike back at those orcs that invade our homes, so that they will never again try to take over the Elven Forest. Will you face the orcs as a member of the guardians? [Quest _105_SkirmishWithOrcs sentinel_kendnell_q0105_03.htm|Say that you will fight the orcs]
